content:
PSA: we just published information on how to join regular project meetings for Cranelift. All interested parties welcome!

wasmtime/meetings/cranelift at main · bytecodealliance/wasmtime
Standalone JIT-style runtime for WebAssembly, using Cranelift - wasmtime/meetings/cranelift at main · bytecodealliance/wasmtime
I am not yet sure if I would be able to attend due to the time, but if I can, is it ok to leave my webcam and mic off?
@bjorn3 yes, that's fine, if that's what you're comfortable with!
I think I will be able to attend.
How long does the meeting take? Is it a fixed time, or until all topics have been handled?
@bjorn3 it runs until we finish agenda items, or until the timeslot (1 hour) is up, whichever is first
send me an email (cfallin@fastly.com) and I can invite you to the Google Calendar event; or I can send you a Zoom link via DM here if you'd prefer

Quick reminder to folks: we're having the Cranelift biweekly, now newly open to anyone who wants to join, in ~25 minutes. Let me know if you want to join and haven't been added to the calendar event yet.
Hey Anton, sure thing. Can you email me (cfallin@fastly.com) from the email address I should send the calendar invite to?
